pull.title: qa: Use assert not BOOST_CHECK_* from multithreaded tests
pull.body: Resolves thread sanitizer failure @MarcoFalke found in #14058

events.message: Use assert when running from multithreaded code as BOOST_CHECK_* are not thread safe

rename.from: Use assert not BOOST_CHECK_* from multithreaded tests
rename.to: qa: Use assert not BOOST_CHECK_* from multithreaded tests

comments.body: Side effect in assertion: Fixed in #14088. Please review :-)
